page.title: 16Shops in Kilgetty.
page.content: Clare, Verity, Michael and Kaye visited shops in Kilgetty. Streamline House has a Mr. John in charge and 8 people work there. It is open from 9 a.m. till 6 p.m. They sell carpets, furniture, beds and shoes. It was opened in March l98l. They had a Sinclair C5 outside which Tenby Lions Club were offering as a raffle prize. The man in charge of the Newsagents next door did not talk to us very sensibly. The shop opened in August last year. 6 part time assistants work there. Customers are local, different from the Streamline shop which has customers from the whole of the County. The Kilgetty railway halt is opposite and the train goes under a very low bridge where vehicles had to pass in the centre and which was one of the reason why the new Kilgetty by pass was opened in l984.
